name: open-poll
description: OpenPoll monorepo with functions/ and web/ workspaces

scripts.emulators: npm run build:functions && npm -w functions exec -- firebase emulators:start --only auth,functions,firestore
scripts.emulators:only: npm -w functions exec -- firebase emulators:start --only auth,functions,firestore
scripts.dev: concurrently -n WEB,EMU -c blue,magenta "npm -w web run dev" "npm run emulators"
